content:
IAccessibleHandler Interface

In this Article

The IAccessibleHandler and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) IAccessibleHandler interface.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("03022430-ABC4-11D0-BDE2-00AA001A1953")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags.FHidden | System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags.FOleAutomation)]
public interface IAccessibleHandler

Remarks

For more information about IAccessibleHandler, see the documentation for the IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID method in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

Methods summary

AccessibleObjectFromID(Int32,Int32,IAccessible)

The IAccessibleHandler and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) IAccessibleHandler interface.

Methods

  • AccessibleObjectFromID(Int32,Int32,IAccessible)

    The IAccessibleHandler and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) IAccessibleHandler interface.

    public void AccessibleObjectFromID (int hwnd, int lObjectID, out Accessibility.IAccessible pIAccessible);

    Parameters

    • hwnd
      Int32

      Specifies the handle of a window for which an IAccessible interface pointer is to be retrieved.

    • lObjectID
      Int32

      Specifies the object ID.

    • pIAccessible
      IAccessible

      Specifies the address of a pointer variable that receives the address of the object's IAccessible interface.

    Remarks

    For more information about AccessibleObjectFromID, see the documentation for the IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID method in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
